name: calculate_nihss
description: Calculate NIH Stroke Scale (NIHSS) for stroke severity assessment. Score range: 0-42. Higher scores indicate more severe neurological deficit. Used for acute stroke evaluation.

loc_questions.description: LOC questions (month, age): 0=both correct, 1=one correct, 2=neither correct

loc_commands.description: LOC commands (open/close eyes, grip): 0=both correct, 1=one correct, 2=neither correct

motor_arm_left.description: Left arm motor: 0=no drift, 1=drift, 2=some effort, 3=no effort, 4=no movement

motor_arm_right.description: Right arm motor: 0=no drift, 1=drift, 2=some effort, 3=no effort, 4=no movement

motor_leg_left.description: Left leg motor: 0=no drift, 1=drift, 2=some effort, 3=no effort, 4=no movement

motor_leg_right.description: Right leg motor: 0=no drift, 1=drift, 2=some effort, 3=no effort, 4=no movement

limb_ataxia.description: Limb ataxia: 0=absent, 1=present one limb, 2=present two limbs

returns.description: Dictionary with score (0-42), severity, and prognosis
